lines.author: Peter Borden
lines.quote: Most advances in science come when a person for one reason or another is forced to change fields.

lines.author: Albert Einstein
lines.quote: As far as the laws of mathematics refer to reality, they are not certain; and as far as they are certain, they do not refer to reality.

lines.author: Mary Caroline Davies
lines.quote: May I forget what ought to be forgotten; and recall, unfailing, all that ought to be recalled, each kindly thing, forgetting what might sting.

lines.author: Charlotte Bronte
lines.quote: I try to avoid looking backward and keep looking upward.

lines.author: Sophie Scholl
lines.quote: The real damage is done by those millions who want to 'survive.' The honest men who just want to be left in peace. [...] Safe?! From what? Life is always on the edge of death; [...] a little candle burns itself out just like a flaming torch does. I choose my own way to burn.

lines.author: Irish toast
lines.quote: May your glass be ever full. May the roof over your head be always strong. And may you be in heaven half an hour before the devil knows you're dead.

lines.author: W. Emerson
lines.quote: I cannot remember the books I've read any more than the meals I have eaten; even so, they have made me.

lines.author: D. Rupert
lines.quote: The goal of a book isn’t to get to the last page, it’s to expand your thinking.

lines.author: Gordon Atkinson
lines.quote: One thing is clear to me. You can't know everything you'd like to know. You can't do everything you'd like to do. You can't read everything you'd like to read. You must hold onto some things and let go of others. Learning to make that choice is one of the big lessons of this life.

lines.author: Henry David Thoreau
lines.quote: There is no remedy for love but to love more.

lines.author: Sara June Parker
lines.quote: May I never miss a sunset or a rainbow because I am looking down.

lines.author: Murray Bookchin
lines.quote: If we do not do the impossible, we shall be faced with the unthinkable.

lines.author: Murray Bookchin
lines.quote: We are part of nature, a product of a long evolutionary journey. To some degree, we carry the ancient oceans in our blood. … Our brains and nervous systems did not suddenly spring into existence without long antecedents in natural history.

lines.author: Murray Bookchin
lines.quote: That which we most prize as integral to our humanity - our extraordinary capacity to think on complex conceptual levels - can be traced back to the nerve network of primitive invertebrates, the ganglia of a mollusk, the spinal cord of a fish, the brain of an amphibian, and the cerebral cortex of a primate.

lines.author: Patricia Russel-McCloud
lines.quote: Life is an escalator: You can move forward or backward; you can not remain still.

lines.author: Ekko
lines.quote: Sometimes taking a leap forward means leaving a few things behind.

lines.author: Frank Underwood
lines.quote: If you don't like how the table is set, turn over the table.
The world is cruel, therefore I won't be
Just because I can survive harsh conditions, doesn't mean I should have to.

lines.author: Donald Glover
lines.quote: I know I'm the shit. I put in the work. And my idea of what is cool is a better road for everybody
Wasting time with you has been the biggest joy in my life.
You can easily return to the past, but no one is there anymore
Dream big, eat well, fuck loud.

lines.author: Antonio Gramsci
lines.quote: The challenge of modernity is to live without illusions and without becoming disillusioned.

lines.author: Frederich Nietzche
lines.quote: They muddy the water, to make it seem deep.
The only way out is through.
There is nowhere to go but everywhere. So just keep rolling under the star.

lines.author: Coach K
lines.quote: Learn how to listen. You’re not gonna learn with you just talking.

lines.author: Lisa Alther
lines.quote: I happen to feel that the degree of a person's intelligence is directly reflected by the number of conflicting attitudes she can bring to bear on the same topic.

lines.author: Ella Wheeler Wilcox
lines.quote: Love much. Earth has enough of bitter in it.

lines.author: Hunter S. Thompson
lines.quote: I hate to advocate drugs, alcohol, violence, or insanity to anyone, but they've always worked for me.

lines.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
lines.quote: Nothing can bring you peace but yourself.

lines.author: Henri Bergson
lines.quote: Think like a man of action, act like a man of thought.

lines.author: Alphonse Allais
lines.quote: Ne remets pas à demain ce que tu peux faire après-demain.
Si l'ont m'apprenais que la fin du monde est pour demain, je planterais quand même un pommier.

lines.author: Louis Guilloux
lines.quote: Il ne s'agit pas de savoir si l'on doit vivre ou mourir, aimer ou haïr. Il s'agit de savoir : au nom de quoi ?

lines.author: Primo Levi
lines.quote: Les jours se ressemblent tous et il n'est pas facile de les compter.

lines.author: Marc Bekoff
lines.quote: Humans are a part of nature not apart from nature.

lines.author: Paul Johnson
lines.quote: The more we understand about life, in general, the more we value the lives of all creatures.

lines.author: Janice Anderson
lines.quote: Embrace compassion without exception.

lines.author: Nemo
lines.quote: Fish are friends. Not food.

lines.author: Albert Camus
lines.quote: The only way to deal with an unfree world is to become so absolutely free that your very existence is an act of rebellion.

lines.author: Mikhail Bakunin
lines.quote: by striving to do the impossible, man has always achieved what is possible. those who have cautiously done no more than they believed possible have never taken a single step forward.

lines.author: Aristippus
lines.quote: If you would only learn to flatter the king, you would not have to live on lentils.

lines.author: Diogenes
lines.quote: If only you would learn to live on lentils, you would not have to flatter the king.

lines.author: Louise Michel
lines.quote: Plus l'homme est féroce envers la bête, plus il est rampant devant les hommes qui le dominent.

lines.author: Louise Michel
lines.quote: Je suis ambitieuse pour l’humanité; moi, je voudrais que tout le monde fût artiste, assez poète pour que la vanité humaine disparût.

lines.author: Serj Tankian
lines.quote: Day is just a collection of hours.

lines.author: Serj Tankian
lines.quote: Everyone is born pure, and it’s the very act of living—fighting for our survival—that beats the purity and goodness out of us.

lines.author: Elisée Reclus
lines.quote: D’abord, la science n’est pas : elle se fait. Le savant du jour n’est que l’ignorant du lendemain.

lines.author: Elisée Reclus
lines.quote: Là où le sol s'est enlaidi, là où toute poésie a disparu du paysage, les imaginations s'éteignent, les esprits s'appauvrissent la routine et la servilité s'emparent des âmes et les disposent à la torpeur et à la mort.

lines.author: Elisée Reclus
lines.quote: Semblables au ruisseau qui s'enfuit, nous changeons à chaque instant; notre vie se renouvelle de minute en minute, et si nous croyons rester les mêmes, ce n'est que pure illusion de notre esprit.

lines.author: Elisée Reclus
lines.quote: Si je n'avais passé de longues heures, couché sur l'herbe, à regarder ou à entendre ces petits êtres, mes frères, peut-être aurais-je moins compris combien est vivante aussi la grande terre qui porte sur son sein tous ces infiniment petits et les entraîne avec nous dans l'insondable espace.
If you keep thinking all those bad thoughts, eventually you'll become them.
All I had I gave.
I'm scared that I'm not making enough memories.
You will fail.
But I won't quit.
Pain is inevitable.
Suffering is a choice.
I want to be loved for who I am, not who I pretend to be.
I don't know a lot about anything, but I know a little about practically anything.

lines.author: Hayao Miyazaki
lines.quote: When you die, you can't see the sunset.
Asking questions is more important than finding answers.

lines.author: Richard Linklater
lines.quote: As you get older, you want less from the world; you just want to experience it. Ordinary things become beautifully poetic.

lines.author: David Lynch
lines.quote: No matter what the weather is, I wish for all of you blue skies and golden sunshine internally all along the way.

lines.author: David Lynch
lines.quote: What a great time to be alive if you love the theater of the absurd.

lines.author: David Lynch
lines.quote: Today I'm thinking about trees and how beautiful they are.

lines.author: Jack Kerouak
lines.quote: I have nothing to offer anyone  except my own confusion.
I accept what I can't control.
We all think we're good people.
Turns out my life purpose isn't to be as small and silent and accommodating as possible.
Be kind to yourself. Be kind to the earth. Be kind to others.
At least we have each other.

lines.author: Chris Cleave
lines.quote: A scar does not form on the dying. A scar means, I survived

lines.author: Larry Kramer
lines.quote: The bigger you get, the more cowardly you become; the more money you receive, the more self satisfied you are

lines.author: Amilcar Cabral
lines.quote: Always bear in mind that the people are not fighting for ideas, for the things in anyone's head. They are fighting to win material benefits, to live better and in peace, to see their lives go forward, to guarantee the future of their childrens

lines.author: Valérie Rey Robert
lines.quote: Nous devons arreter de croire que le sexisme est un probleme de femmes; les hommes en sont les principaux auteurs, ils ont donc collectivement la responsabilité d'y mettre fin.
Chaque année 94000 femmes sont victimes de viols, 98% des auteurs sont des hommes.
EN FRANCE UNE FEMME MEURT TOUT LES TROIS JOURS SOUS LES COUPS DE SON CONJOINT

lines.author: Valérie Rey Robert
lines.quote: J'ai eu beaucoup de mal à écrire ce chapitre parceque la seule chose que j'avais envie d'écrire aux hommes tenait en quelques mots : Fermez la, Ecoutez nous, Arretez d'être lache face au sexisme, Arretez d'agresser sexuellement.

lines.author: Murray Bookchin
lines.quote: The assumption that what currently exists must necessarily exist is the acid that corrodes all visionary thinking.

lines.author: Murray Bookchin
lines.quote: There are no hierarchies in nature other than those imposed by hierarchical modes of human thought, but rather differences merely in function between and within living things.

lines.author: Murray Bookchin
lines.quote: What compels me to fight this society is, of course, outrage over injustice, a love of freedom, and a feeling of responsibility for perpetuating and enlarging the human spirit — its beauty, creativity, and latent capacity to improve the world.

lines.author: Murray Bookchin
lines.quote: I do not care to come to terms with an irrational society that corrodes all that is valuable in humanity, that eats away at all that is beautiful and noble in the human experience.

lines.author: Murray Bookchin
lines.quote: We must consciously create our own world, not according to mindless customs and destructive prejudices, but according to the canons of reason, reflection, and discourse that uniquely belong to our own species.

lines.author: Murray Bookchin
lines.quote: There can be no separation of the revolutionary process from the revolutionary goal. A society based on self-administration must be achieved by means of self-administration.

lines.author: Murray Bookchin
lines.quote: An anarchist society, far from being a remote ideal, has become a precondition for the practice of ecological principles.

lines.author: Murray Bookchin
lines.quote: We are confronted with the need not simply to improve society or alter it; we are confronted with the need to remake it.

lines.author: Murray Bookchin
lines.quote: The great project of our time must be to open the other eye: to see all-sidedly and wholly, to heal and transcend the cleavage between humanity and nature.

lines.author: Rosa Luxembourg
lines.quote: The most revolutionnary thing one can do is always to proclaim loudly what is happening.

lines.author: Chaia Heller
lines.quote: It is time for ‘nature’ to be brought down to earth, to become the very stuff of our lives: the crowded street in our neighborhood, the water with which we wash our clothes, both sky scraper and smoke-stack, as well as the plants, animals, and  other creatures with whome we share the planet.

lines.author: Chaia Heller
lines.quote: Ecology must become the desire to infuse the objects, relationships, and practices of everyday life with the same quality of integrity, beauty, and meaning that people [...] commonly reserve for ‘nature’.
Pas de fachos dans nos quartiers, Pas de quartiers pour les fachos
Pétain revient, t'as oublié tes chiens !
Siamo tutti antifascisti !
Pas d'répit pour les racistes, action, action antifasciste !
Ami si tu tombes, mille amis sortent de l'ombre

lines.author: Françoise Giroud
lines.quote: Ainsi commence le fascisme. Il ne dit jamais son nom, il rampe, il flotte, quand il montre le bout de son nez, on dit : C'est lui ? Vous croyez ? Il ne faut rien exagérer ! Et puis un jour on le prend dans la gueule et il est trop tard pour l'expulser.

lines.author: Bertolt  Brecht
lines.quote: Le fascisme n'est pas le contraire de la démocratie, mais son évolution par temps de crise.

lines.author: André Malraux
lines.quote: J'ai vu les démocraties intervenir contre à peu près tout, sauf contre le fascisme.

lines.author: Slavoj Zizek
lines.quote: Nietzsche avait bien perçu comment la civilisation allait aboutir au dernier homme, une créature apathique sans passion.

lines.author: Slavoj Zizek
lines.quote: Le seul moyen de vaincre l'intégrisme est de le priver du terreau sur lequel il se développe.

lines.author: Moby
lines.quote: Could you look an animal in the eyes and say to it: ‘My appetite is more important than your suffering’?

lines.author: Franz Kafka
lines.quote: Now I can look at you in peace; I don’t eat you anymore.

lines.author: Alicia Silverstone
lines.quote: Being vegan helped me realise I can say and do what I believe is right. That’s powerful.

lines.author: George Bernard Shaw
lines.quote: The worst sin towards our fellow creatures is not to hate them but to be indifferent to them: that’s the essence of humanity.
To you, it is just a meal. To them, it is existence itself.
If vegans went vegan to feel superior and special, we wouldn’t encourage everyone else to do it. Which is it? Are we preaching and pressuring or doing it for our own egos?

lines.author: Natalie Portman
lines.quote: Three times a day I remind myself that I value life and do not want to cause pain or to kill other living beings. That is why I eat the way I do.

lines.author: Gary L Francione
lines.quote: Veganism is not “a sacrifice.” It is a joy.
If you think eating meat is just a personal choice, you’re forgetting someone.
Animals are not voiceless, you are not listening.
Anything you can do, I can do vegan.
We’ll stop using straws to save fish, but won’t stop eating fish to save fish.
Happiness is finding out there are vegan options.

lines.author: Ed Winters
lines.quote: Veganism is a stepping stone: although it’s the single simplest thing that we can do to have the largest positive impact, it’s by no means the only thing that we can do.

lines.author: Peter Singer
lines.quote: We are, quite literally, gambling with the future of our planet – for the sake of hamburgers.

lines.author: Will Tuttle
lines.quote: There is something about veganism that is not easy, but the difficulty is not inherent in veganism, but in our culture.

lines.author: Mikhail Bakunin
lines.quote: When the people are being beaten with a stick, they are not much happier if it is called the People's Stick.

lines.author: Emma Goldman
lines.quote: If voting changed anything they would make it illegal.

lines.author: Emma Goldman
lines.quote: So I decided to become a midwife… I wanted to deliver a thousand babies. And as each one arrives, especially the little girls, I’ll be there first to whisper into her tender little ear: REBEL! REBEL!

lines.author: Emma Goldman
lines.quote: If I can't dance, I don't want to be part of your revolution.

lines.author: Oscar Wilde
lines.quote: With the abolition of private property, then, we shall have true, beautiful, healthy Individualism. Nobody will waste his life in accumulating things, and the symbols for things. One will live. To live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people exist, that is all.

lines.author: Emma Goldman
lines.quote: I want freedom, the right to self-expression, everybody's right to beautiful, radiant things.

lines.author: Mikhail Bakunin
lines.quote: The urge to destory is a creative urge.

lines.author: Oscar Wilde
lines.quote: Upon the other hand, there are a great many people who, having no private property of their own, and being always on the brink of sheer starvation, are compelled to do the work of beasts of burden, to do work that is quite uncongenial to them, and to which they are forced by the peremptory, unreasonable, degrading Tyranny of want.

lines.author: Frederick Douglas
lines.quote: The struggle may be a moral one, or it may be a physical one, or it may be both. But it must be a struggle. Power concedes nothing without a demand. It never did and it never will.

lines.author: Karl Marx
lines.quote: Let the ruling classes tremble at a Communistic revolution. The proletarians have nothing to lose but their chains. They have a world to win. Working Men of All Countries, Unite!

lines.author: Guy Debord
lines.quote: Quotations are useful in periods of ignorance or obscurantist beliefs.

lines.author: Voltairine de Cleyre
lines.quote: I die as I have lived. An anarchist. Owing allegiance to neither God nor man.

lines.author: The Clash
lines.quote: Murder is a crime, unless it was done by a police man.
Society will only be free when the last capitalist is hung by the entrails of the last bureaucrat

lines.author: Durruti
lines.quote: We have always lived in slums and holes in the wall. We will know how to accommodate ourselves for a while. For you must not forget that we can also build. It is we who built these palaces and cities, here in Spain and America and everywhere. We, the workers. We can build others to take their place. And better ones. We are not in the least afraid of ruins. We are going to inherit the earth; there is not the slightest doubt about that. The bourgeoisie might blast and ruin its own world before it leaves the stage of history. We carry a new world here, in our hearts. That world is growing in this minute.

lines.author: Krishnamurti
lines.quote: It is no measure of health to be well adjusted to a profoundly sick society.

lines.author: Lucy Parsons
lines.quote: When the prison, stake or scaffold can no longer silence the voice of the protesting minority, progress moves on a step, but not until then.
Sous les pavés, la plage!

lines.author: Buckminster Fuller
lines.quote: The best way to predict the future is to design it.

lines.author: Jean Pierre Foucault
lines.quote: Is it surprising that prisons resemble factories, schools, barracks, hospitals, which all resemble prisons?

lines.author: Albert Libertad
lines.quote: Resignation is death. Life is revolt.

lines.author: George Jackson Brigade
lines.quote: We are cozy, cuddly, armed and dangerous ... and we will raze every fucking prison to the ground.

lines.author: Bhagat Singh
lines.quote: Bombs and pistols alone do not make a revolution. The sword of revolution is sharpened on the whetting-stone of critical thought.

lines.author: Assata Shakur
lines.quote: Nobody in the world, nobody in history, has ever gotten their freedom by appealing to the moral senses of the people who were oppressing them.

lines.author: Mikhail Bakunin
lines.quote: The state is nothing more than the sum total of the liberties denied to the individual by a society.
Our aim is to agitate and disturb people. We're not selling bread, we're selling yeast.

lines.author: Emma Goldman
lines.quote: When we can't dream any longer we die.

lines.author: Ericco Malatesta
lines.quote: We anarchists do not want to emancipate the people; we want the people to emancipate themselves.
À chacun selon ses besoins, de chacun selon ses moyens.

lines.author: Mikhail Bakunin
lines.quote: To revolt is a natural tendency of life. Even a worm turns against the foot that crushes it. In general, the vitality and relative dignity of an animal can be measured by the intensity of its instinct to revolt.

lines.author: Murray Bookchin
lines.quote: The domination of nature by man stems from the very real domination of human by human

lines.author: Diogenes
lines.quote: In the rich man's house, there is nowhere to spit but in his face.

lines.author: Louise Michel
lines.quote: C'est que le pouvoir est maudit, et c'est pour cela que je suis anarchiste.

lines.author: Louise Michel
lines.quote: Ce n'est pas une miette de pain, c'est la moisson du monde entier qu'il faut à la race humaine, sans exploiteur et sans exploité.

lines.author: Louise Michel
lines.quote: Quand la foule aujourd'hui muette, Comme l'Océan grondera, Qu'à mourir elle sera prête, La Commune se lèvera.

lines.author: Serj Tankian
lines.quote: I really feel like civilisation's already over. It's not ending but it's already done. We're all addicted to the concept that humanity equals civilisation and that's not the case. We need a global conversation to be able to decipher how we can live from this point forward. We have to redefine our relationship with our environment.

lines.author: System of a Down
lines.quote: What is it in us that turns a deaf ear to the cries of human suffering?

lines.author: System of a Down
lines.quote: Where do you expect us to go when the bombs fall?

lines.author: Tom Morello
lines.quote: A good song should make you wanna tap your foot and get with your girl. A great song should destroy cops and set fire to the suburbs. I'm only interested in writing great songs.

lines.author: Rage Against the Machine
lines.quote: Yes I know my enemies. They're the teachers who taught me to fight me, compromise, conformity, assimilation, submission, ignorance, hypocrisy, brutality, the elite, all of which are American dreams.

lines.author: Rage Against the Machine
lines.quote: Is all the world jails and churches?

lines.author: Elisée Reclus
lines.quote: Parmi les causes qui dans l'histoire de l'humanité ont déjà fait disparaître tant de civilisations successives, il faudrait compter en première ligne la brutale violence avec laquelle la plupart des nations traitaient la terre nourricière.
Sometime Depressed But Always Antifascist
Do you believe in life after work?
The news is what's left of the truth after its manipulation by the ruling class.

lines.author: Mariame Kaba
lines.quote: Let this radicalize you rather than lead you to despair

lines.author: Emiliano Zapata
lines.quote: "I'd rather die on my feet than live on my knees"

lines.author: Fred Hampton
lines.quote: You can kill the revolutionary but you can never kill the revolution.

lines.author: Fred Hampton
lines.quote: Nothing is more important than stopping fascism, because fascism is gonna stop us all.

lines.author: Fred Hampton
lines.quote: We're gonna have to do more than talk. We're gonna have to do more than listen. We're gonna have to do more than learn. We're gonna have to start practicing and that's very hard.

lines.author: Fred Hampton
lines.quote: If you walk through life and don't help anybody, you haven't had much of a life

lines.author: Black Sabbath
lines.quote: Politicians argue for their own cause. Generals talk of peace but they want war

lines.author: Blackbird Raum
lines.quote: The great divide between the rich and the poor/ The powerful and the weak/ The haves and the have-nots/ It's a world of contradictions

lines.author: THEA
lines.quote: On ira, S'aimer sur les barricades, Cramer toute la capitale, S'tenir la main sur les toits, Mais promis c'est amical, Mais promis c'est amical.

lines.author: NoFX
lines.quote: I define success as not working, and I live like a king

lines.author: Gringe
lines.quote: Lancer un pavé dans la mare ou une vitrine, c'est tout c'qui reste quand le dialogue est rompu.

lines.author: Gringe
lines.quote: On les a taxés d'incivisme et d'ignorance (Comme d'hab'), ils ont répondu par la légitime violence (Eh ouais).

lines.author: Orelsan
lines.quote: Pourquoi tu joues les rebelles avec des idées toutes faites, si quand tu croises ton patron tu penses qu'à faire des courbettes ?

lines.author: grandson
lines.quote: The price of your greed is your son and your daughter, what you gon' do when there's blood in the water?

lines.author: grandson
lines.quote: When the last tree's fallen, the animal can't hide, money won't solve it : what's your alibi?

lines.author: grandson
lines.quote: Is it time to speak up or time for silence?\nTime for peace or is it time for violence?\nIs there anybody out there that's payin' attention?

lines.author: grandson
lines.quote: Do you have enough love in your heart, to go and get your hands dirty?

lines.author: NoFX
lines.quote: Or maybe, tear it apart.\nStart with assumption, that a million people are smart,\nSmarter than one.

lines.author: NoFX
lines.quote: We are the queer ! We are the whore !\nAmmunition in the class war; We are worker, We love our queen, We sacrifice.

lines.author: NoFX
lines.quote: We are the whore ! We are the queer !

lines.author: NoFX
lines.quote: I think that our kids will probably see the end of humanity as we know it, cause this world’s about to blow it.

lines.author: NoFX
lines.quote: Will they see what they saw in ancient Rome, the destruction of the home? Will they see the end of civility?

lines.author: NoFX
lines.quote: History is just an alibi; It’s believing every lie man has ever dared to write.

lines.author: Donald Knuth
lines.quote: To program is to write to another programmer about our solutions to a problem

lines.author: Donald Knuth
lines.quote: In fact what I would like to see is thousands of computer scientists let loose to do whatever they want. That's what really advances the field.

lines.author: Irish toast (and James (then Garrus))
lines.quote: May your glass be ever full. May the roof over your head be always strong. And may you be in heaven half an hour before the devil knows you're dead.

lines.author: Javik
lines.quote: Stand in the ashes of a trillion dead souls and ask their ghosts if honour matters. Their silence will be your answer.

lines.author: Nassana
lines.quote: Shepard... but... youre dead ?!

lines.author: Shepard
lines.quote: I got better!

lines.author: Shepard
lines.quote: I should go.

lines.author: Shepard
lines.quote: I'm sorry I can't hear you, I'm getting a lot of bullshit on this line.

lines.author: Shepard
lines.quote: Nobody ever fell in love without being a little bit brave.

lines.author: Tank bred krogan
lines.quote: I am not perfect, but I have purpose.

lines.author: Anderson
lines.quote: You did good, son. You did good. I’m proud of you.

lines.author: Wrex Urdnot
lines.quote: You are a champion to the Krogan people, a friend of Clan Urdnot, and a brother to me. To every Krogan born after this day, the name ‘Shepard’ will mean ‘Hero’! Now, let's show them why!

lines.author: Jack
lines.quote: Turns out, mess with someone's head enough, you can turn a scared little kid into an all-powerful bitch.

lines.author: Jeff “Joker” Moreau
lines.quote: I don't trust anyone who makes more than I do

lines.author: Wrex Udnot
lines.quote: Better than I’d feared. Worse than I’d hoped.

lines.author: Shepard
lines.quote: I won't let fear compromise who I am.

lines.author: Major Kirrahe
lines.quote: We held the line.

lines.author: Mordin
lines.quote: Cultural artistic expression reflects philosophical evolution, interest in growth- perspective, observation, interpretation. Suspect you won't see any art in collector base. Culturally dead; tools for the reapers. Worse than death.

lines.author: Eve
lines.quote: There is no other reason to exist other than the hope the next day will bring change. And if it doesn't, there is always the next.

lines.author: Charr
lines.quote: Let my broken bones build a wall around your garden, so you and the flower we planted together can grow safe and strong.

lines.author: Tali'Zorah
lines.quote: After time adrift among open stars, among tides of light and to shoals of dust, I will return to where I began.

lines.author: Samara
lines.quote: Only your actions will be remembered, choose them well.

lines.author: Shepard
lines.quote: But take heart! Look around you! You're not in this fight alone. We face our enemy together, and together, we will defeat them!

lines.author: Liara T'Soni
lines.quote: I've always lived for the pursuit of knowledge - whatever form that may take. Information is just one of many, and it's a valuable commodity.

lines.author: Shepard
lines.quote: You're not even alive. Not really. You're just a machine. And machines can be broken!

lines.author: Garrus
lines.quote: It's so much easier to see the world in black and white. Gray... I don't know what to do with gray.

lines.author: Garrus
lines.quote: Are you kidding? I'm right behind you.

lines.author: Kaidan Alenko
lines.quote: But sometimes the way a thing goes down does matter, Shepard. Later, when you have to live with yourself. Knowing that you acted with integrity--then it matters.

lines.author: CSec officer
lines.quote: Do you want me to arrest you ?

lines.author: Wrex
lines.quote: I want you to try.

lines.author: Wrex
lines.quote: We’re both warrior Shepard. Out of respect I want to warn you, I’m going to kill Fisk

lines.author: Wrex
lines.quote: If I die in here, I’ll kill him

lines.author: Wrex
lines.quote: Anything that isn’t constantly challenged grows weak

lines.author: Liara T'Soni
lines.quote: You humans are creatures of action. You pursue your goals with an almost indomitable determination. It is an admirable trait, but also an intimidating one.

lines.author: Jacob Taylor
lines.quote: The more good you do, the less they want to admit something needed doing.

lines.author: Samara
lines.quote: I am a ruined vessel of sorrow and regret, but I am free.

lines.author: Jack
lines.quote: So fuck you and thanks for asking.

lines.author: Shepard
lines.quote: Words mean nothing until you put them into action.

lines.author: Shepard
lines.quote: Some people think asking for help is a sign of weakness. That's just being stupid and stubborn. No matter how strong you are, allies can make you stronger.

lines.author: Jack
lines.quote: Shit you sound like a pussy

lines.author: Jack
lines.quote: I don’t care. I’m out to survive it, then cut loose

lines.author: Jack
lines.quote: Rough stuff. I like it.

lines.author: Jack
lines.quote: Whatever you say, Boss man

lines.author: Tali'Zorah
lines.quote: Give me a scrap of metal, a microprocessor, and I’ll make it do precision jump

lines.author: Jack
lines.quote: Dead is dead. There’s no such things as a good way to go.

lines.author: Jack
lines.quote: I don’t care. I’m out to survive it, then cut loose

lines.author: Tali'Zorah
lines.quote: I don’t think life is about what you deserve.

lines.author: Wrex
lines.quote: What a kick in the quad

lines.author: Thane
lines.quote: We must carry the weight of our decisions Shepard.

lines.author: Tali'Zorah
lines.quote: Im as free as the dust in the solar wind

lines.author: Shepard
lines.quote: I'm only slow cause I'm not running

lines.author: Shepard
lines.quote: I need to know someone is getting out of this alive.

lines.author: Wrex
lines.quote: You look well for dead, Shepard. Should have known the void couldn't hold you.

lines.author: Wrex
lines.quote: Now we can get back to doing what krogan do best: saving everyone else from giant monsters.

lines.author: Tali'Zorah
lines.quote: The Pilgrimage proves we are willing to give of ourselves for the greater good. What does it say about me if I turn my back on this?

lines.author: Tali'Zorah
lines.quote: We're family. This is just the worst kind of family meeting.

lines.author: Jeff “Joker” Moreau
lines.quote: I’m not good. I’m not even great. I’m the best damn helmsman in the Alliance fleet.

lines.author: Jack
lines.quote: You know what it's like... to think you're alone and find out you're not?

lines.author: Grunt
lines.quote: I don't like this. Fury is my choice, not a sickness.

lines.author: Grunt
lines.quote: SHEPERD S HEPAURD  SHEPARUD!!!

lines.author: Jacob Taylor
lines.quote: I guess I just got tired of never making a difference.

lines.author: Jacob Taylor
lines.quote: If these are our final days, I want to spend them protecting these people.

lines.author: Legion
lines.quote: How could we have become so different? Why can we no longer understand each other? What did we do wrong?

lines.author: Mordin Solus
lines.quote: Lots of ways to help people. Sometimes heal patients; sometimes execute dangerous people. Either way helps.

lines.author: Thane Krios
lines.quote: The measure of an individual can be difficult to discern by actions alone.

lines.author: Aria T'loak
lines.quote: I'm back, you fuckers.

lines.author: Kelly Chambers
lines.quote: Character matters, not race or gender.

lines.author: Eve
lines.quote: In the darkest hour, there is always a way out.

lines.author: Zaal'Koris vas Qwib-Qwib
lines.quote: I would argue that the best hope for our people is not to be destroyed in a senseless war. But I fear I am in the minority.

lines.author: Samantha Traynor
lines.quote: If flagging your messages and managing strategic intel helps you in any way, then it's worth it.

lines.author: Cora Harper
lines.quote: Things feel better, though they don't feel fixed yet. Remember to take time for yourself, too. Work's important, but so is time to grieve.

lines.author: S. Theris, “Twelve Leaves”, verse 132
lines.quote: Grief and fear cannot rule you; let them be your faithful servants, protective of their mistress. Loss serves a huntress like fuel serves fire.

lines.author: Cora Harper
lines.quote: The razor's edge between known and unknown teaches you what can be cut away.

lines.author: Drack Nakmor
lines.quote: This usually helps me: (Drack has attached 37 images of various rifles and shotguns. Two are duplicate images. Many are low-res or watermarked.)

lines.author: Peebee
lines.quote: The Milky Way was so... been-there-done-that. Even if I hadn't done it, someone had.

lines.author: Liam Kosta
lines.quote: I believed in a new beginning. Still do. I have to. We're in it.

lines.author: Vetra Nyx
lines.quote: What I'm saying is, different's not always better. I don't regret anything—or what I've done to get where I am.

lines.author: Alec Ryder
lines.quote: Every great moment in our history began with a dream.

lines.author: Alec Ryder
lines.quote: When your back is against the wall, use it.

lines.author: Garrus
lines.quote: We should record this and broadcast this to the reapers. They'll either run away, melt down, or fall in love.

lines.author: Wrex
lines.quote: Ah, next you'll be going on about how the strong aren't supposed to eat the weak. But everybody's weaker than me! What am I supposed to eat for lunch?

lines.author: Shepard
lines.quote: People are messy, awkward, sometimes selfish or cruel. But they're trying. And I'm going to make sure they have a chance

lines.author: Garrus
lines.quote: I just don't see the point in staying quiet and polite. Not when the galaxy is at stake.

lines.author: Morinth
lines.quote: Look into my eyes and tell me you want me. Tell me you'd kill for me. Anything I want.

lines.author: Grunt
lines.quote: We'll push our ennemies to the edge of space, then steps on their fingers one at a time until the void takes them.

lines.author: Jack
lines.quote: Rather do it to them first.

lines.author: Shepard
lines.quote: I have a lot to live for.

lines.author: Shepard
lines.quote: You've got to fight. We need you in this.

lines.author: Dr. Karin Chakwas
lines.quote: We didn't work for them, we used them. If I were to feel anything it would be guilt.

lines.author: Shepard
lines.quote: Yeah, I don't know Garrus. But I'm sure as hell gonna give it my best shot.

lines.author: Admiral Hackett
lines.quote: So I'll find their soft spots, avoid them where they're strong, and hit them when they're not.

lines.author: Garrus
lines.quote: Yell loud enough, and someone will eventually come over to see what all the fuss is about.

lines.author: Jack
lines.quote: I had no idea the king of the Boy Scout would show up.

lines.author: Wrex
lines.quote: Now we can get back to doing what krogan do best - Saving everyone from giant monsters.

lines.author: Major Kirrahe
lines.quote: Always expect trouble, failing that create trouble for someone else.

lines.author: Shiala
lines.quote: Our every action ripples through time, touching generations in ways we cannot hope to fathom.

lines.author: Tali'Zorah
lines.quote: Keelah se'lai.

lines.author: Garrus
lines.quote: We've had a hell of a ride, haven't we ?

lines.author: Shepard
lines.quote: Times like these, you know who your real friends are. They're not the ones running around looking for an escape route. They're the one who stand at your side through the worst of it, who never give up on you.

lines.author: Garrus
lines.quote: You're not going to propose marriage now are you ?

lines.author: Shepard
lines.quote: Nobody is giving up. Not those turians. Not me. Not you.

lines.author: Cortez
lines.quote: If anyone can pull this all together, it's you. And I'm with you.

lines.author: Anderson
lines.quote: No matter how good you think you are, there's always somebody quicker, faster and a helluva lot smarter than you around the corner.

lines.author: Liara
lines.quote: I spend so much time chasing knowledge. Sometimes I forget that there are things you learn by doing nothing. By just spending time with the people you care about.

lines.author: Jack
lines.quote: Hey, you look like shit.

lines.author: Kolyat
lines.quote: When I was little I thought my father had it all figured out. He said men must be loyal to their friends and dangerous to their enemies. But when he prevented me from... from hurting someone,  he had changed. He said ennemies and ego are not as important as loved ones.

lines.author: Charr
lines.quote: My dream was to be by your side, a weed beside your beauty, twinning together in the warm Tuchanka sun.

lines.author: Tali'Zorah
lines.quote: You fought when no one else would. When nobody else believed you. You can do this. I know you can.

lines.author: Garrus
lines.quote: Before your friend picks you up, dusts you off, and tells you you're the best damned soldier he's ever met.

lines.author: Garrus
lines.quote: I've lost a few fights in my time - and i'm still here. It's because I always made sur the next one belonged to me. And the one after that.

lines.author: James
lines.quote: You need to cut yourself some slack. Whatever it takes to get that data back from Cerberus, we're behind you.

lines.author: Shepard
lines.quote: We can't ignore that people are dying. The Reapers have no mercy, but we do.

lines.author: Cortez
lines.quote: Hell no. I'm not just any shuttle pilot. I'm your shuttle pilot. Wouldn't have it any other way.

lines.author: Grunt
lines.quote: I don't know. Drank a bit, left the hospital, broke a few windows.

lines.author: Grunt
lines.quote: Heh heh heh

lines.author: Shepard
lines.quote: You want me to sit there and watch you cook ?

lines.author: Kaidan Alenko
lines.quote: You're not watching me cook. You're helping me drink beer. Now sit your ass down.

lines.author: Shepard
lines.quote: So remember how I saved the Citadel? And then -you weren't there- I survived a suicide mission ? All these close calls I've had only to be taken out by dinner.

lines.author: Tali'Zorah
lines.quote: When do we get to stop reacting to our parents and start living for ourselves?

lines.author: Jack
lines.quote: You're getting this. Hope you like it, 'cause it's too late now.

lines.author: Grunt
lines.quote: Ever seen a krogan drink so much they get sick on your floor? I'm here to make sure that dream comes true!

lines.author: Jack
lines.quote: Oh that's just fuckin perfect. Did it occurs to you that maybe I'm trying to grow as a goddamn person?

lines.author: Samara
lines.quote: You know, Zaeed, there's nothing wrong with silence between two friends.

lines.author: Jack
lines.quote: I still really hate you, but you have fantastic tits.

lines.author: Miranda
lines.quote: All right. I can live with this.

lines.author: Jack
lines.quote: Knock that shit off. You're gonna blow the Reapers to hell. And then you're coming back and taking me out dancing.

lines.author: Jack
lines.quote: You know, for all the shit we've been through, we've had a damn good ride.

lines.author: Shepard
lines.quote: The best.

lines.author: Shepard
lines.quote: I don't know how it's going to end, but whatever happens...

lines.author: Jeff “Joker” Moreau
lines.quote: What do you mean, whatever happens? Everyone knows what's going to happen. You're gonna kick some Reaper ass. That's what you do. And I'll be flying you there in style.

lines.author: Diana Allers
lines.quote: The laughing part is important. I want you to make it all normal again, Shepard. Because that's the best revenge I can think of.

lines.author: Shepard
lines.quote: But that fear's gonna keep me alive long enough to strike these bastards right through the heart.

lines.author: Shepard
lines.quote: Sure, everything will change - but on our terms. We've been running until now, Miranda. It has to stop.

lines.author: Jack
lines.quote: Don't get killed dumbass. When this is over, I'm getting laid.

lines.author: Shepard
lines.quote: I love you, too.

lines.author: Garrus
lines.quote: No, I think we're about to kick the Reapers back into whatever black hole they crawled out of. Then we're going to retire somewhere warm and tropical and live off the royalties from the vids.

lines.author: Garrus
lines.quote: Forgive the insubordination, but this old friend has an order for you... Go out there and give them hell. You were born to do this.

lines.author: Liara
lines.quote: I just know I'll have a clever line five minute from now.

lines.author: Wrex
lines.quote: One word beat the monsters back to the abyss, and one word brought death to an ennemy none dared fight! That word was ‘Krogan’! And today the krogan rise again! Today we forge a new path and join the galaxies as allies in victory! Today... We win our future!

lines.author: Javik
lines.quote: The future is still out there. It is something my people could never say: there will be a tomorrow.

lines.author: Javik
lines.quote: You are now the avatar of this cycle. The exemplar of victory. Not just for humanity, or turians, or protheans - but for all life. Every soul that has ever existed is watching this moment.

lines.author: Shepard
lines.quote: Well, no pressure when you put it that way.

lines.author: Javik
lines.quote: Do not waver. Victory is never won without difficult choices.

lines.author: Samara
lines.quote: Reflecting on one's place in the universe while a party rages within reach can feel oddly self-affirming.

lines.author: Samantha Traynor
lines.quote: Not with that voice! It's like feeling smoky satin slide accross your skin in soft candlelight.

lines.author: Shepard
lines.quote: Come on, Liara. You've seen the data. Even if we win, you and I won't live to see the parade.

lines.author: Liara
lines.quote: Then what's the damn point? Of drinks... or... any of it... if we could all die tomorrow?

lines.author: Shepard
lines.quote: It's not tomorrow yet.

lines.author: Garrus
lines.quote: Come here often ? I imagine anyone who does is probably an alcoholic.

lines.author: Shepard
lines.quote: Maybe you’re right. Maybe we can’t win this. But we’ll fight you regardless! Just like we did Sovereign. Just like I’m doing now! However insignificant we may be. We will fight! We will sacrifice! And we will find a way! That’s what humans do!

lines.author: Thane
lines.quote: Removing evil isn't the same as creating good

lines.author: Javik
lines.quote: Despair is the enemy's greatest weapon. Do not let them wield it.

lines.author: Drack
lines.quote: Parents aren't meant to be a goal or a finish line. We're the starting line. Where you go from there? It's all you. Remember that.

lines.author: Miles Morales
lines.quote: Nah, Imma do my own thing.

lines.author: Miles Morales
lines.quote: "Everyone keeps telling me how my story is supposed to go."

lines.author: Rio Morales
lines.quote: Wherever you go from here, you have to promise to take care of that little boy for me. Make sure he never forgets where he came from. And he never doubts that he's loved. And never lets anyone tell him that he doesn't belong there.

lines.author: Spider-punk
lines.quote: "Taking a crap on the establishment. I salute you."

lines.author: Yoda
lines.quote: Do or do not, there's no try.
The club is bumping. The ladies look good. The alcohol is flowing. There's much pain in this world but not in this room.

lines.author: J.R.R. Tolkien
lines.quote: ‘I wish it need not have happened in my time,’ said Frodo. ‘So do I,’ said Gandalf, ‘and so do all who live to see such times. But that is not for them to decide. All we have to decide is what to do with the time that is given us.’

lines.author: J.R.R. Tolkien
lines.quote: If more of us valued food and cheer and song above hoarded gold, it would be a merrier world.

lines.author: J.R.R. Tolkien
lines.quote: Deserves it! I daresay he does. Many that live deserve death. And some that die deserve life. Can you give it to them? Then do not be too eager to deal out death in judgement. For even the very wise cannot see all ends.

lines.author: J.R.R. Tolkien
lines.quote: And he took her in his arms and kissed her under the sunlit sky, and he cared not that they stood high upon the walls in the sight of many.

lines.author: J.R.R. Tolkien
lines.quote: Courage is found in unlikely places.

lines.author: J.R.R. Tolkien
lines.quote: So comes snow after fire, and even dragons have their endings.

lines.author: J.R.R. Tolkien
lines.quote: Where there's life there's hope.

lines.author: J.R.R. Tolkien
lines.quote: I do not love the bright sword for its sharpness, nor the arrow for its swiftness, nor the warrior for his glory. I love only that which they defend.

lines.author: Carmen Berzatto
lines.quote: Yes chef. Say it back.

lines.author: Carmen Berzatto
lines.quote: You’re watching the fire and you’re thinking, ‘if I don't do anything…this place will burn down and all my anxiety will go away with it.‘

lines.author: Luca
lines.quote: You can spend all the time in the world in here, but if you Dont spend enough time out there...

lines.author: Carmen Berzatto
lines.quote: No amount of good is worth how terrible this feels.

lines.author: Richie
lines.quote: This Is A Delicate F*cking Ecosystem!

lines.author: Blackbird Raum
lines.quote: But it won't be the witches that are burning this time.

lines.author: System of a Down
lines.quote: Pretending that we live doesn't make us alive.

lines.author: Serj Tankian
lines.quote: My cock is much bigger than yours.

lines.author: System of a Down
lines.quote: Always want to play but you never want to lose.

lines.author: Rage Against the Machine
lines.quote: It has to start somewhere, it has to start sometime, what better place than here? What better time than now?

lines.author: Rage Against the Machine
lines.quote: When ignorance reigns, life is lost...

lines.author: Rage Against the Machine
lines.quote: Fuck you I won't do what you tell me. Fuck you I won't do what you tell me

lines.author: Black Sabbath
lines.quote: Black Sabbath, sabbath bloody sabbath/ Evil is on the rise/ Evil is on the loose

lines.author: Days N' Daze
lines.quote: Rise to live, don't die to sleep. Fight for your life, don't give up the fight

lines.author: NoFX
lines.quote: We live on borrowed time but can't decide who the payments are for.

lines.author: NoFX
lines.quote: We're the moron brothers/ We're the idiots of the world/ We're the ones who don't know what to do/ We're the ones who don't know where to go

lines.author: NoFX
lines.quote: I had a garden but my flowers died of negligence.

lines.author: THEA
lines.quote: Parce qu'il faut bien laisser une trace, Dans un regard ou dans la glace, Oh mon amour fais moi la place.

lines.author: THEA
lines.quote: Je te chant'rai qu'la vie est belle, J'en crois pas un mot mais, Je croyais en rien avant ton ‘je t’aime’

lines.author: THEA
lines.quote: Y'a que la tristesse qui nous retient, Tout est colère, tout est venin.

lines.author: THEA
lines.quote: Toutes nos ivresses se sont éteintes, Corps libertaires au creux d’tes mains.

lines.author: THEA
lines.quote: Même plus envie de débattre, La colère voudrait tout foutre en l’air.

lines.author: My Chemical Romance
lines.quote: He said, ‘Son, when you grow up, would you be the savior of the broken, the beaten, and the damned?’ He said, ‘Will you defeat them, your demons and all the non-believers, the plans that they have made?’

lines.author: My Chemical Romance
lines.quote: We'll carry on, we'll carry on, and though you're dead and gone, believe me, your memory will carry on, we'll carry on.

lines.author: My Chemical Romance
lines.quote: So paint it black and take it back, and let's shout it loud and clear

lines.author: My Chemical Romance
lines.quote: We want it all, we wanna play this part, I won't explain or say I'm sorry, I'm unashamed, I'm gonna show my scar.

lines.author: My Chemical Romance
lines.quote: They're gonna clean up your looks with all the lies in the books to make a citizen out of you.

lines.author: My Chemical Romance
lines.quote: They're gonna rip up your heads, your aspirations to shreds, another cog in the murder machine.

lines.author: NoFX
lines.quote: Come on underachievers, Come on all you underpass believers; We’ll give you the skill for street livin', It feels pretty great to just give in, so just give in.

lines.author: NoFX
lines.quote: We've got no competition, We've got no accomplished mission, We just wanna live and let others live.

lines.author: NoFX
lines.quote: Let's just fuck and drink and be alive, not just survive.

lines.author: Greenday
lines.quote: My mind is set on overdrive, the clock is laughin' in my face.

lines.author: Minutes til Midnight
lines.quote: I'm going out fighting, Like lightning, I'm thunder and the rain.

lines.author: Dua Lipa
lines.quote: All night, I'll riot with you; I know you got my back and you know I got you.

lines.author: Dua Lipa
lines.quote: It's time I wave goodbye from the window.

lines.author: Dua Lipa
lines.quote: Let's be bad together, make the devil smile.

lines.author: Orelsan
lines.quote: J'me suis fait tout seul, j'me suis fécondé.

lines.author: Disiz
lines.quote: J'voudrais m'noyer dans les airs, j'veux qu'on m'enciele, pas qu'on m'enterre.

lines.author: Disiz
lines.quote: Et j'y traduirai la Grâce; j'm'accrocherai à c'que j'pourrai; j'm'en fous qu'tu sois dans l'espace.

lines.author: Disiz
lines.quote: Ma douce, pleure pas tes morts, tu leur ferais du tort; s'ils étaient vivants, te verraient comme ça, s'ils étaient vibrants, te prendraient dans leurs bras; tu les rendrais tristes, te voir dans cet état.

lines.author: Disiz
lines.quote: Mais qu'ils ont de la chance, d'avoir quitté ce monde; Bien sûr, ils nous manquent, mais quelle bénédiction.

lines.author: Disiz
lines.quote: La vie me va comme un gant d'boxe, et je refuse de rester au sol en attendant le décompte; L'amour me sauvera, j'serai jamais sauvé par le gong.

lines.author: Disiz
lines.quote: Je rentre dans l'arène, dans la ronde; La mort me donnera raison de ce monde.

lines.author: Disiz
lines.quote: Dans l'miroir est mon adversaire.

lines.author: Disiz
lines.quote: J'veux aller au bout du jour, pas au bout de la nuit.

lines.author: Disiz
lines.quote: Trop proche de la dèche, précaire est la vocation, mais trop fier pour faire d'la lèche pour d'la dotation.

lines.author: Disiz
lines.quote: Ils pensent être les rois du monde, moi, je suis le roi de moi; Si, demain, c'est la fin du monde, j'suis préparé depuis des mois.

lines.author: Disiz
lines.quote: Qu’on était sublime, sublime; Beaux, vrais, forts, on était sublime.

lines.author: Disiz
lines.quote: J’aime quand le ciel est mauve, le soir, et s’accorde avec ma peine pastel.

lines.author: Disiz
lines.quote: J'suis intenable, j'suis increvable; Peu importe, j'ai d'la force, tout est possible, tout est faisable.

lines.author: Disiz
lines.quote: J'veux que d'la lumière, que d'la vie, que d'la vibe, que d'la graille; Je suis boosté, j'suis en roue libre, je suis high, je suis high.

lines.author: grandson
lines.quote: Now I am the violence, I am the sickness; Won't accept your silence, beg me for forgiveness.

lines.author: grandson
lines.quote: When I go into the ground, I won't go quietly, I'm bringin' my crown.\nWhen I go into the ground, Oh, they gotta bury me, bury me face down.

lines.author: grandson
lines.quote: I've been on the run, since I was a boy,\nBut now I'm done runnin', got another thing comin',\nWatch my enemies get destroyed.

lines.author: NoFX
lines.quote: We've been divided, we've been bled, like a chicken without a head, running frantically amok, taking but not giving a fuck.

lines.author: NoFX
lines.quote: It’s time, it needs to be said. I’m sorry to be the one to inform you, but man and womankind has unfortunately been pronounced dead.

lines.author: Orelsan
lines.quote: Maintenant, t'es dans l'grand bain, devine comment on nage.

lines.author: Orelsan
lines.quote: Comme à chaque fois qu'tu déménages, c'est un monde qui s'écroule; Écoute, l'histoire s'écrit en tournant les pages.

lines.author: Orelsan
lines.quote: Souvent seul avec tes problèmes, souvent, c'est toi l'problème.

lines.author: Orelsan
lines.quote: T'es au moment d'ta vie où tu peux devenir c'que tu veux; Le même moment où c'est l'plus dur de savoir c'que tu veux.

lines.author: Orelsan
lines.quote: Ah, c'qui compte c'est pas l'arrivée, c'est la quête.

lines.author: Orelsan
lines.quote: Quand t'as l'désert à traverser, il y a rien à faire, sauf d'avancer.

lines.author: Orelsan
lines.quote: En vrai, tu peux pas tout contrôler faut que tu l'acceptes; Être heureux, c'est comme le reste, faut d'abord apprendre à l'être, je sais.

lines.author: Orelsan
lines.quote: Tu vas te coucher en disant demain j'le fais, tu t'réveilles en disant demain j'le fais, mon ami.

lines.author: Flora Cash
lines.quote: I saw the part of you, That only when you're older, you will see too.

lines.author: Flora Cash
lines.quote: It's like you told me, go forward slowly, it's not a race to the end.

lines.author: Flora Cash
lines.quote: Well, you look like yourself, but you're somebody else; Only it ain't on the surface\nWell, you talk like yourself, no, I hear someone else though.

lines.author: The Last Dinner Party
lines.quote: I wish I knew you, when touch was innocent,\nI wish I knew you, before it felt like a sin.

lines.author: Linkin Park
lines.quote: Time is a valuable thing, watch it fly by as the pendulum swings, watch it count down to the end of the day.

lines.author: Linkin Park
lines.quote: What it meant to me will eventually be, a memory of a time when I tried so hard.

lines.author: Linkin Park
lines.quote: I don't know what you're expecting of me, put under the pressure of walking in your shoes.

lines.author: Linkin Park
lines.quote: I don't know what's worth fighting for or why I have to scream.

lines.author: System of a Down
lines.quote: Grab a brush and put a little makeup, hide your scars to fade away the shakeup.

lines.author: System of a Down
lines.quote: Always wanna play, but you never wanna lose.

lines.author: System of a Down
lines.quote: Such a lonely day should be banned; It's a day that I can't stand.

lines.author: System of a Down
lines.quote: Dead man lying on the bottom of the grave, wondering when savior comes, is he gonna be saved?

lines.author: mazie
lines.quote: Even though by now I think we should have realized: Everyone is dumb (dumb, dumb, dumb, dumb, dumb, dumb, dumb).

lines.author: IAM
lines.quote: Pour s'apercevoir que l'espoir émerge du noir; Une partie de tout homme la force manipule; D'un rien il suffit pour que l'être bascule.

lines.author: IAM
lines.quote: Petit présomptueux ne vois-tu pas le nombre déployé ? L'armée des ombres, tu seras éliminé.

lines.author: Deftones
lines.quote: Shut up, you don't know me ! Squeal like a pig when you pickpocket, big fuckin' head!

lines.author: Portugal. The Man
lines.quote: As I finally meet my end, I won't be scared, I won't defend the things I've done.

lines.author: Portugal. The Man
lines.quote: I just wanna sleep forever; Never see tomorrow or lead or follow,\nI don't wanna work forever; Know what I know or beg or borrow.
You don't hate mondays, you hate the pain of existence.
It's november 10th now. There is a circulatory system walking through the kitchen
Salut everybody tout le monde ! Ca y est c'est mardi, c'est bientôt le week-end !

lines.author: Greenday
lines.quote: Summer has come and passed, the innocent can never last, wake me up when September ends.

lines.author: Buffalo Grill (to Thomas Dargent)
lines.quote: Bon anniversaire les p'tits Indiens ! Bon anniversaire les p'tits cow-boys ! Venez chanter et danser avec tous vos copains. Ici tout est permis, on s'amuse bien !

lines.author: Jess
lines.quote: I don't think I can even look at him without getting pregnant.
Never resist an impulse, Sabrina, especially if it's terrible.
Promise me one thing - don't take me home until I'm drunk.

lines.author: Hitchcock
lines.quote: Did you ever have the feeling that you were being watched?

lines.author: Hitchcock
lines.quote: Did you ever have the feeling that you were being watched?
A good life needs some bad day.
I'm curious about people. No one's totally uninteresting.
You don't want to see anyone, or to talk, or to think, nor to go out, or move.
You are not bad, you are just in pain.
I believe one should fight for what one believes
What if God just put us here for his own entertainment?
He's simply passing time without actually living his life. In other words, he's not really even alive.
Live carefully, because there are people around you.

lines.author: Flight of the Conchords
lines.quote: What I really need is just some... just some compliments, I think.
I just met a wonderful man. He's fictional, but you can't have everything.

lines.author: Trainspotting
lines.quote: One thousand years from now, there'll be no guys, and no girls, just wankers.
Why do you want to die Henri?

lines.author: Henri
lines.quote: Personal reasons.
A little older, a little more confused.

lines.author: Log Lady
lines.quote: One day the sadness will end.
I don't want realism. I want magic.

lines.author: Bong Joon-ho
lines.quote: To me, that's cinema

lines.author: Martin Scorcese
lines.quote: Yeah, that's cinema

lines.author: David Lynch
lines.quote: Follow your dreams. Unless they're stupid.

lines.author: David Lynch
lines.quote: Believe it or not, Primary Colours are total fucking bullshit.
Elaborate on that.

lines.author: David Lynch
lines.quote: No.

lines.author: David Lynch
lines.quote: Okay, let's try that again, but this time good.
This is not a psychotic breakdown. It's a cleansing moment of clarity.

lines.author: Hot Priest
lines.quote: And love isn't something that weak people do.\nBeing a romantic takes a hell lot of hope.

lines.author: Everything Everywhere All At Once
lines.quote: When I choose to see the good side of things, I'm not being naive. It is strategic and necessary. It's how I've learned to survive through everything.
Waking up was the worst idea.
I'm scared this is all I will ever be.
Don't give up now... I think I see a light.
...And this man can protect it. For he is now cosmically aware!

lines.author: Clark Kent
lines.quote: The world is too big, Mom.

lines.author: Martha Kent
lines.quote: Then make it small.

lines.author: Ramona Flower
lines.quote: Are you well? Do you have brain damage?
